snippet: A federal judge’s antitrust finding against Apple over e-book prices underscores how much the book industry has changed and bolsters the advantage held by the online retailer.
abstract: Federal judge’s antitrust finding against Apple over e-book prices underscores how much book industry has changed and bolsters advantage held by Amazon; judge says Apple illegally conspired with five of six biggest publishers to try to raise prices in budding e-books market; while Apple will be punished, and publishers are chastened, Amazon is left free to exert its dominance over e-books.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge’s antitrust finding against Apple over e-book prices underscores how much the book industry has changed and bolsters the advantage held by the online retailer.

headline.main: E-Book Ruling Gives Amazon an Advantage
headline.print_headline: E-Book Ruling Gives Amazon An Advantage
